```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
if (!require(devtools)){
    install.packages('devtools')
}
devtools::install_github('progenetix/pgxRpi')
library(pgxRpi)
```


#Lung non small cell carcinoma C2926
```{r}
freq <- pgxLoader(type='frequency', output='pgxseg',filters='NCIT:C2926',
                  codematches=T)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq, chrom = 14)
```

# I find losses at: 3p, 4, 5q, 6q 8q, 9, 10, 13q, 15p, 17q, 19q, 21q
# Gains at: 1q, 3q, 5q, 7, 8q, 14, 20, X
# These findings generally are accepted by [this paper](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S1556086415322450)
